Container.Name: ownCloud
Container.Description: ownCloud gives you universal access to your files through a web interface or WebDAV. It also provides a platform to easily view and sync your contacts, calendars and bookmarks across all your devices and enables basic editing right on the web.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/var/www/owncloud/data[/b] : this path is where ownCloud data is stored to.[br][br] [b]Tip:[/b] Set EDGE variable to '1' if you want to always run the last version.
